trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> is used as a peer for <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> when it contains the following tree:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> é usado como um par de <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> quando ela contém a seguinte árvore:

trans-unit.source: ![HwndSource->Visual->2 UIElement objects](~/add/media/apgenericroot.png "HwndSource->Visual->2 UIElement objects")
trans-unit.target: ![HwndSource->Visual->2 objetos UIElement](~/add/media/apgenericroot.png "HwndSource -> Visual -> 2 objetos UIElement")

trans-unit.source: Because only <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types have peers, and visuals are not <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types, a common parent does not exist in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.
trans-unit.target: Porque somente <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tipos têm pares e visuais não são <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tipos, um pai comum não existe no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] de árvore para o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tipos.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] expects a single root peer from the application; therefore, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] creates a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> in order to serve as a single root peer to parent peers for the two <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] espera um par de raiz única de aplicativo. Portanto, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] cria um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> para servir como um par de raiz única de pares de pai para os dois <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tipos.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the root peer is a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o par de raiz é um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Pane" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Pane" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> que representa o retângulo delimitador do <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Pane".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém "Painel".

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rótulo de texto do <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que contém o rótulo.

trans-unit.source: You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pensar a propriedade name como se fosse uma cadeia de caracteres de texto que os usuários usam para explicar o controle está referenciando.

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que você tenha uma representação textual para todos os controles de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] para que você pode consultar programaticamente o controle de maneira localizada.
